text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Mogu…… mogu…… Haah…… Yep, I knew these haskaps were excellent……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Thank you for sharing! I'm glad the tasting was a good opportunity for you.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: You ordered by phone, right? The mother there is an old friend of mine. She was very happy when I moved to Tokyo. She even make me business card……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ha! No, no! It's nothing serious! It's all right!
……Looking at the last few days, It look like a big problem. Perhaps the cause of it is―.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『I am the star of Tomakomai!"』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Huh? How do you know about that――
choice_data_list: Because that's the kind of atmosphere you make……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ……… no way. I didn't notice…… ……
Now, if you're in a problem, you can talk to me if you want.
She began to talk in hushed tones as if she had given up on the idea.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『……I have lived in Tomakomai ever since I can remember. It is a town with the scent of the sea and the sky is wide open.』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『On my days off, I go to the harbor and watch the big boats come by, ride my bike to the park, or play on the lake……』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『As I was spending time like that, I noticed that the town was changing little by little.』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『I noticed stores whose shutters are no longer up and dusty show windows. Towns are quietly fading away.』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『I was surprised. I knew the word 'depopulation' but…… I was like, oh, "our place is like that, too."』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『I was afraid that if I left it alone, it would just keep disappearing……』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『I couldn't stand by and let it happen, so I started working as a locodol.』

text_block_list.name: Tomakomai Local
text_block_list.text: A locodol is a local idol.…… Hmmm. So you mean like…… sign girls, or something like that?

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Yes, yes! For example, I was wondering if I could catch the audience's attention by singing or dancing.

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: But if I do it in the middle of the street, only the locals will see it. I was wondering where to do it, that's what worries me……

text_block_list.name: Tomakomai Local
text_block_list.text: Well then, Tarumae-chan, we have a great place for you. A stage that only horsegirl can appear on, a very special stage!

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I'm from Tomakomai Hokko Tarumae! I will sing, "Come on, Tomakomai"!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『I joined a local junior club and started competing in races. I did a post-race live show to promote Tomakomai, and the results were pretty good―』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『One day, I was approached by a racing official from Tokyo.』

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… 『If you enroll in the Tracen Academy and run in the Twinkle Series, you can promote Tomakomai to many times as many people as you do now.』…… huh?

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… Tracen Academy. I hadn't thought about it…… but―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I thought, "This is my chance. The Twinkle Series is our chance to promote Tomakomai nationwide."

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I want to do my best…… I want to spread the word about Tomakomai ……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: From there, I trained hard and was accepted to Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I'll do my best! I will definitely make Tomakomai more exciting!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ……Yes, I give it my best……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: The more I tried, the less successful I got in both racing and locodol.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ……Everyone from Tomakomai was really kind enough to send me off. They gave me a tusk and a business card and made me…… expect a lot from myself.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: If I don't do it, another store might close, and Tomakomai might become even smaller.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: And yet…… nothing has been done ……!
choice_data_list: …… I think, you are overthinking this.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… Eh?

text_block_list.name: Haskap Farm Owner
text_block_list.text: 『I see.……She is working really hard to achieve her dreams.』

text_block_list.name: Haskap Farm Owner
text_block_list.text: 『We can't lose either. Actually, she's inspired us so much that we've recently started working on social media.』
Maybe I should show her what they are doing. And when I searched on social media, I found a website with an unfamiliar atmosphere.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ……………… blog updates, launch of online shopping, and regular events.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Wow, so many people…… at the event, they are working with city hall too ……! I can't believe they were doing this―……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: There is a blog written about me…… "About Hokko Tarumae, Tomakomai's locodol."

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I hope she is doing well in Tokyo. She was very enthusiastic about boosting Tomakomai, but I am concerned that she may be carrying too much on her shoulders.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… 『If you are well, that's the best. Leave the local matters to us. I'll tell her that on her next trip home.』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: 『Please watch over her when you meet her in Tokyo. Please take good care of our treasure, Hokko Tarumae.』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ……I'm such an idiot……! I underestimated ……! People wouldn't let Tomakomai be carried on one person's back……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: The tusk, the business card…… the kind words. Just to boost my own dream all along……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… just for the sake of my dreams……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ahhhhhhhh!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: What are you doing, Tarumae! Get a hold of yourself, Tarumae!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: The people of Tomakomai! They are really kind! They support my dream from the bottom of their hearts!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: That's why ……That's why! I'll do my best for Tomakomai! I'll spread the word about Tomakomai!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ―Trainer-san! Will you be my trainer and help me on my training?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I definitely want to win the next mock race. I want to win and be the kind of person who can proudly show off to everyone in Tomakomai.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: So I want to make sure I'm up to par…… I need help professional!
Thus, just like that, I signed a contract with Hokko Tarumae.
